DOC.brief_summary: The purpose phase I portion ; 1 ) evaluate safety tolerability MK2461 2 ) determine recommend phase 2 dose dos MK2461 . The purpose phase II portion evaluate anti-tumor efficacy MK2461 .
DOC.brief_title: MK2461 Phase I/II Study Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors ( MK-2461-002 AM1 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patients must least 18 year age , adequate organ function , ecog performance < 2 No chemotherapy , radiotherapy , biological therapy 4 week study participation Patients must primary central nervous system tumor
